title: Distribution of gross domestic product ( GDP ) across economic sectors Costa Rica 2018
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 3 lines representing Agriculture, Industry, and Services. The y axis denotes Share of GDP and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Services is gradually increasing, Industry is gradually decreasing, Agriculture is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Services, 2. Industry, and lastly, 3. Agriculture.
Overall across the Year, Services mostly maintained the highest Share of GDP when compared to others with a mean value of 64.77, and it peaked at 2018.
After Services, Industry overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 21.1, peaking at 2009.
The botommost line, Agriculture,  has a mean of 5.62, and peaked at 2009.
